commit message:
LoginUtils.getAccountLoginDetails(): Avoid a null dereference.

This was caused by the recent commit to avoid copy/pasted code.

LoginActivity: Avoid a crash during loginSync() when there is no network.

And ignore the wifi-only setting for login, because the user really wants
to use the network.
Add some more info log output to show when we try to download images.

SubjectAdder.downloadMissingImages(): Don't try if there is no network.

We already ignore the exception in the caller, because it is normal,
though we didn't actually throw the exception.
The lack of a check here might have caused us to download missing images,
though not new images, while not on wifi even while the wifi-only
setting was on.

ZooFragment.showAbout(): Show the version at the top.

Instead of at the bottom. This should make it easier to be sure what
version people have.
